title: Monster
description: My life was irrevocably changed that night. The night I was taken. I saved a man's life, but at what cost to myself? Can I convince him to save me in return?I hate him for what he's done to me. But the longer I'm trapped with him, the harder it is to cling to that hatred. He is an enigma of a man, one who is shockingly arrogant, sweetly contrite, and frighteningly aggressive by turns. And the pain in his eyes is a mirror for my own.The longer I remain in his grip, the more confused I become.Is my freedom worth betraying him?Note: This is the first story in a trilogy of serialized novellas. Get the rest of the series in one collection in Impossible: The Original Trilogy (Monster, Traitor, and Avenger).Warning: This series contains strong language and scorching sex scenes involving light BDSM.
author: Julia Sykes
